articles.description: After her court hearing on Thursday, the Grammy-winning rapper made a quick visit to the San Gennaro Festival in Manhattan's Little Italy, where she enjoyed a Pepsi and Italian sausage.
articles.content: Cardi B has been spotted celebrating with an Italian sausage after accepting a plea deal with no prison time for hurling a champagne bottle at a pair of sisters working at a strip club, one of whom s… [+6250 chars]
